metadata.synopsis: Jaheira Follower ADs if you try and leave the area when she's a follower, kicks her back to where she was meant to be.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Start heading out of moonrise to trigger the warning (just before the bridge)- Go further along the bridge (Halfway) for her to leave properly

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Where are we going? The battle is back the other way.

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Ketheric will not wait on our pleasure, nor jump on his sword without our aid. I go back to the battle - find me when you are ready to fight.
